scripts.deploy: eb use udagram-api-dev && eb setenv AWS_BUCKET=udacitystore AWS_PROFILE=default AWS_REGION=$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION JWT_SECRET=$JWT_SECRET POSTGRES_DB=postgres POSTGRES_HOST=udacity-databse.cq8rvewyk7rx.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com POSTGRES_PASSWORD=$POSTGRES_PASSWORD POSTGRES_USERNAME=$POSTGRES_USERNAME URL=http://udacity-fullsnack-js-4.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com & eb deploy --staged udagram-api-dev & eb status
scripts.build: npm install . && npm run clean && tsc && cp -rf src/config www/config && cp -R .elasticbeanstalk www/.elasticbeanstalk && cp .npmrc www/.npmrc && cp package.json www/package.json && cd www && zip -r Archive.zip . && cd ..
